```{r}
library(nycflights13)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

# loads the data 
```{r}
thisfile=here("CU_ACAD_DEPT_WHEN_OFF_ENRL.csv")

df1=read_csv(thisfile) %>% clean_names()
```

# learn how to use the skim function
```{r}
skimr::skim(df1)
```

# filters the data. Want to keep the rows that apply to MA131 and MA132
```{r}
df_calc = df1|>
  select(-acad_org,-title,-current_status,-course_id) |>
  filter(subject=="MA", 
         catalog %in% c(120,125,131,132),
         component == "LEC", term_8 == "Fall 2023")


tot_enrl = df_calc[6]

```



# this sums up all the students who is eligible to enroll in MA132 in Spring 2024
```{r}

y = sum(tot_enrl)

```


# estimates the enrollment of spring 2024. Sometimes students donâ€™t move on from calc 1 or equivalent classes so we estimated that 95% of the students do move on to calc 2.
```{r}
SP24 = 0.95 * y
round(SP24)
```
